name: YOYO's Revenge
description:
YOYO's revenge

You wake up in the middle of the night to find your YOYO stolen, and your wife has been kidnapped. There is a hole on your lawn leading to a portal in another dimension. 

You must rescue your wife, but you will need to find your yoyo first. 

Keys

QAOPM 

Pressing 2 in game pauses.

Pressing 1 in game redefines keys - yes, you can redefine keys mid game!

Notes on design:

For this game I wanted to make something thing that was both linear, but had metrovania elements. So you have to back drack and find new items that can help open up certain areas. 

So disaster strikes!

After working on this game for months, usually everyday, the file didn't save correctly last night. I intended to finish the game today, but I can't, and now maybe I've lost so much there is nothing I can do. 

The Factory edit is the closest version I have to the final game I intended.

Update - no disaster anymore!

After a  days work on this I managed to recover the game from an old file I used to experiment with. So good news, I have a final version as I intended it to be!
